Perplexity Shortcut: Quick Access to AI-Powered Search

Seamlessly integrate Perplexity AI search into your browsing experience without disrupting your regular Google searches. Access powerful AI-driven results with a simple keyboard shortcut from any webpage.

Key Features:
- Quick Access: Use Alt+Q (Option+Q on Mac) to open a search box instantly.
- Context Menu: Right-click to search selected text directly.
- Customizable: Dark or light mode option to fit your theme.

Why Choose Perplexity Shortcut?

Unlike other extensions that replace your default search, Perplexity Shortcut coexists with your regular Google searches. Enjoy the best of both worlds â€“ traditional search when you need it, and AI-powered insights at your fingertips.

Setup Instructions:
1. Visit chrome://extensions/shortcuts
2. Find "Perplexity Shortcut"
3. Set "Toggle Perplexity search input" dropdown to "Global"
4. Enjoy instant access with Alt+Q/Option+Q (or your custom shortcut)

Note: A browser restart may be required after installation for full functionality.

Streamline your research and get instant, AI-powered answers without compromising your familiar search experience!
